titles.title: O blessed Savior, is Thy love

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O blessed Savior, is Thy love So great! so full! so free! Fain would we have our thoughts, our hearts, Our lives, engaged with Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though in the very form of God, With heav’nly glory crowned, Thou didst a servant’s form assume, Beset with sorrow round.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou wouldst like wretched man be made In everything but sin, That we as like Thee might become As we unlike had been:{/lang-eng}

v7
